website_summaries.verdict: The Dell S2330MX is a well-designed general purpose monitor with a pleasing aesthetic at a great price.
pros: The Dell S2330MX has a thin, aesthetically pleasing design, well-placed connections, and good overall performance
The fact that this comes at such a low price is icing on the cake
cons: The monitor has flimsy build quality, a very unstable foot stand, and its OSD navigation isn't as smooth as what we've come to expect from Dell

customer_reviews.title: Dell S2330MX
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. I bought two for my new computer and they worked perfectly from day one. Pros: Looks good Good build quality Amazing picture Thin and light weight LED Price DVI to HDMI adapter included Cons: The only con I have is the power button is a little weird to get used to. It's a touch button that you have to have your finger fully on or it won't notice it. If you just tap it with your finger tip it won't turn on or off. But it's not really a big issue and definitely not worth losing a star over.
customer_reviews.author: CADMAN

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor to connect to my laptop for those times when I want to look at a bigger screen and it has worked perfectly! I have recommended this monitor to others. You won't be disappointed if you order one for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: stargazerlily

customer_reviews.title: Dell S2330MX 23" Ultra-Slim VGA Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor 2 or 3 years ago and it has been the best monitor we've had. As you get older it's very helpful if the screen and letters are a little larger. My husband and I both have a problem of needing reading glasses to read or see some items up close. With this monitor we don't need the reading glasses but it also has such a beautiful color on the screen. Some of our grandsons have told us what a better screen this has then theirs, We have never had a bit of trouble with it and the colors are as good as when we first purchased it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Nash

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, however...
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing. This thing is great no matter what b.s. nit-picky reviews you read from people that sit in dark rooms making out with their monitors. That said, it is flimsy and typing this does shake the screen a bit. The bezel was cracked in the corner when I got it, but I'm not one to care so after warming it up and verifying no dead pixels, super glue did the job. I'm not one to care that much, but many would. At any rate, it plays movies/games just fine and I wouldn't spend a dime more for another monitor.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the monitor for about three weeks now and I love it. I finally upgraded from a 17" to a 23" and it makes my life a lot easier working on layout and design projects.I don't mind working from home whenever I need to now! I agree with other reviews that the stand is a little weak but if you don't plan on moving it around much, it works great. Also, the control buttons almost seem non-existent--you have to know just where to touch on the rim of the screen to access the controls. Even so, I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great performing monitor. Nice colors, lightweight. My only complaint with this monitor is that it doesn't have VESA mounting capabilities, so it has to sit on your desktop as you won't be able to mount it. This is the second one of these that I have purchased to compliment the first one. Very happy with the overall performance and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: JB14

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This screen is amazing!! I love the price! the best at its kind! i usually do a lot of research before buying any product and if u're looking to buy a monitor for ur laptop this one is the best i found! 23" LED with amazing 1080p it looks great next to my 15" macbook pro and gave me much more room to work. it's super thin too i was shocked by how slim it is! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Merhej

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, Very Clear and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Always happy with the Dell monitors, but as most of the less expensive setups, the base is made of plastic and doesn't give you very much ability to adjust the angle and no way to change the height. Overall it's a great monitor for the price. The screen is clear and crisp and it is quite thin. A great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T Millard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor, easy controls. Working great after two plus years. Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Louie from Waterloo  Iowa

customer_reviews.title: responsiveness is phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: ive tried several monitors popularized for their low input lag, and this one is the best so far. almost the same as using a crt display, and probably the closest youre gonna get. display is good, and it is thin, which is neat. deducting one start for no mounting capability--no vesa screw-holes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ian Staker

customer_reviews.title: I really like this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really like this monitor and for the price it has great picture and I have no problem with the on/off button as some have said in other comments. Only issue I have is figuring out how to keep it from falling asleep so quickly. That's a computer setting though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ross

customer_reviews.title: The Monitor is fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: This was truly a bargain deal. For the money I paid, I got a high quality and efficient piece of equipment. It was delivered quickly and appeared barnd new despite the amazon listing as used. Pros: large enought to fit two webpages side by side Energy efficiency settings Great color Huge display The display is also very very thin Power and settings buttons are touch. Like not mechanical buttons. Two settings buttons can be programmed Cons: The display is so thin that the vibrations when I type go through my desk and shake the display a little.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor with a few quirks.
customer_reviews.text: The power button is very sensitive... Does not always react when you try to turn it off or on.. The base is very flimsy so the whole thing shakes... That said.. its beautiful.. great picture.. I do not mind the small problems.. its a great monitor over all..
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lee Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: All fine.. box damaged in shipping and a slight ...
customer_reviews.text: All fine.. box damaged in shipping and a slight bend in the middle of the case. but it works so thats ok
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged well and took only minutes to set up. I didn't need to mess with any settings. No dead pixels or other issues. Good price for the size. I like that it tilts backward, and also how light and thin it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rigley

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. The monitor looks great and works as expected. I am very happy with it Great monitor for playing video games, digital audio workstation (DAW), video editing, or simply a slightly bigger monitor for those with failing eye site.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Flat Screen Monitor
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I was impressed with was the weight of this monitor, very light. The colors are brilliant and the screen render is very sharp with minimum reflection. Very good for working in a bright light environment. For the price, this is an excellent monitor - impressive :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Vivid colors. Very fast (2MS) response time makes it great for gaming. Best overall product I found for the money. Paid only $139 for a 23", 2MS monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Picture
customer_reviews.text: Super thin screen with an awesome picture quality. I bought this on Black Friday for around $130 to be an extra screen to hook up to my laptop when doing video or photo work. The picture is absolutely amazing and the screen is less than a quarter of an inch think. Very lightweight and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: This prodykt vere good .I don't have a problem with this product.I recomed this product for my frends.Ivere happe.Thank you vere mach
customer_reviews.author: andrey

customer_reviews.title: Crisp clean monitor
customer_reviews.text: very nice monitor. Cheap but well made and nice and slim monitor Works as well as the E series but thinner. I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Dell Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor --needed/wanted more than my laptop screen for my school work (computer science major). This is a very good monitor without spending $300-350.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy stand, but sleek
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy if you bump the desk, but a small trade off for the slim profile. Good picture, but the power block is kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: A. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: supper
customer_reviews.text: It is about 150 dollar monitor, but it is perfect! design, quality, everything about this product!! so good! It is definitely good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: klee

customer_reviews.title: Dell 23" Ultra-Slim Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This exceded my expectations. It is bright and sharp and fits in the hutch of my computer desk great. Would definitly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this monitor is excellent. The kids use it mostly and they love it. The picture is better than the monitor we replaced and the price was about $400 less.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Connall

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the size of this monitor. It's clear and the colors are great. I highly recommend it if you want a larger monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kerby

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. It has excellent picture quality and an ULTRA slim design. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it wobbles a lot if you bump the table at all. Its not a big deal and has never fallen over but I wish it was a little more stable. I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Went from 19" to 23"
customer_reviews.text: I had a 19" monitor that came with my comp[uter and it was a good one, but, in time, I felt a larger screen would be better. Now I am wishing I'd of went to a 27", which is my goal in the future. Bigger is always better especially in monitors.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these monitors to go in my home office and I cant brag on them enough. The picture quality is far superior than what you would expect for this price. Also, when it says ultra slim, they mean it. There is virtually no heat coming off of these bad boys. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Shirey

customer_reviews.title: I Like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good Monitor, here's the only thing you must like a wildscreen, make sure to use the right setting, the C D is good for that so use it
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Veal

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor for 139.99, about a day after the Thanksgivings Day. The monitor is fabulous. Pictures, and colors are very good.But it doesn't come with a DVI cable so make sure to get your own if you don't already have one, or want to use dual monitors.
customer_reviews.author: skop159

customer_reviews.title: Dell S233)M 23" Ultra=Slim VGA Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen all it's cracked up to be, good visability and great on the eyes, Love the big screen good for Kindle books and movies
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: 23" monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is crystal clear in HD. It is slim and fits my desk space nicely. It was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Now sweat = no problems. What more could you ask for with a digiatal electronic device in this high tech world
customer_reviews.author: Al C

customer_reviews.title: Slim as promised 23 Inch
customer_reviews.text: This screen is too slim and it comes with a converter from DVI-HDMI and it's really goo with resolution I like it till now
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Fathi

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it. she squeeled when she saw it. It arrived quickly also. Would buy it again in a heatbeat.
customer_reviews.author: JerimyS

customer_reviews.title: Dell VGA Monitor
customer_reviews.text: An excellent plug and play monitor. It has great resolution and quick refresh. And it fit in my suitcase to take overseas!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome HQ Quality, Great shipping time/ packaging. All around, love it. Monitor is super light and slim. Would love it if it had HDMI port, and if the DVI and Power cords connected vertically (as in, plug into a port on the bottom, vs directly into the back so they stick out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris King

customer_reviews.title: office computer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bigger screen. I am Very Happy with the monitor. I would go smaller. I am very much appreciated the bigger screen and very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Just another LED monitor
customer_reviews.text: Many people talk this and that about must monitors including thisone, but in the end its another simple Led monitor like must of its kind, nothing special... I recoment this monitor for anyone that space its important because of its thin size.. I bought it, but I gived to my father and I when back to my old Dell sp2208wfp, that looks much better for gaming and movies, maybe because of its glossy screen... I hope this helps you....
customer_reviews.author: angelo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star monitor if the connections faced down instead of straight out from the back of the unit. The picture quality and ease of installation exceeded expectations. If I see the same deal again I will consider buying a second one for one of my other systems.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A great product for a very reasonable price. I am especially impressed with the on/off switch. Dell has finally gotten the message and replaced the cheesy mechanical switch with a touch pad like on a Kindle or Ipad. I can recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Billy R. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Loves my monitor
customer_reviews.text: It looks sleek and appealing on my desk. its very thin compared to other monitors. colors seem to pop from the screen. stand has some wobble but keeps the monitor stable.
customer_reviews.author: cstubbz69

customer_reviews.title: Everything is huge
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my new monitor. This one is way better than my old NEC 17 inch prehistoric led monitor. The quality is great and its just physically good looking. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jdmdriv3n

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor replaced an old CRT and the difference is spectacular. I do a little photo work but mostly just surfing and mail and for my needs it has performed as promised and that's all I ask of a product. I like to believe that you get what you pay for and in this case I feel that this was money well spent. Adjusting the picture to properly fill the screen and maintain the correct aspect ratio is not fully explained but some poking around and I found the solution and that's why it rates a 4 and not a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great great great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love it, works great with my mac mini 2012. picture quality is great too. I totally recommend it .....
customer_reviews.author: Rede

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product, excellent image. The DVI adapter was a big plus as it simplified setting it up in a dual screen (extended) setup.
customer_reviews.author: SWN

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is working very well for me. I like the quality of the screen and how thin it is and the size is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Resolution
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, slim design. The light touch buttons can be a bit annoying. I set up the Xbox and computer to it and using those buttons to switch back and forth is just cumbersome. No HDMI connections but comes with dongle. Stand does not have any adjustments but no big deal for me. Good value monitor for clear picture and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The rating and review for the monitor is on the wrong object.
customer_reviews.text: The rating and review for the TV is wrong I haven't received the TV yet. The review for the monitor is written in the space for the Tv.
customer_reviews.author: Armanda Desiato

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: S U P E R C U T E a n d B R I G H T as H e a v e n A+++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Thang Bui

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this monitor because of the poor text quality. Despite fiddling with the display settings for three days, I get a slightly fuzzy text with inadequate depth. It reminds me of looking at an old dot matrix printer output. I gave it my best shot and used it for a few days hoping I'd adjust to it, but with the poor text quality it just was too much work for my eyes, and gave me a headache after using it for a while. Of course this is a 'cheap' display so I could not expect too much. I guess I'll have to pony up and spend a few more bucks to get something that works.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

product_meta.title: Dell S2330MX 23" Ultra-Slim VGA Monitor
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM




DELL S2330MX 23" ULTRA-SLIM MONITOR WITH LED


THRILLING HD VISUALS IN A BEAUTIFULLY THIN DESIGN
Enjoy full high-definition viewing on a 23" monitor that's incredibly slim, exceptionally sleek and environmentally conscientious.



 * Ultra-slim panel: Add design flair to virtually any space with Dell's slimmest LED monitor ever.
 * Full high-definition viewing: Enjoy an incredible multimedia experience with Full HD (1920x1080 max.) resolution.
 * Environmentally conscientious design: Rest easy knowing your Dell S2330MX monitor is designed to be safe for your home and the environment with arsenic-free and mercury-free LED panels.




ENJOY HIGH-DEFINITION THRILLS AND ENERGY-CONSCIENTIOUS PERFORMANCE.
Bring your multimedia experiences to life with the energy-conscientious Dell S2330MX monitor. With its 23" (58cm) LED screen and sleek, ultra-slim design, it looks great from any angle.



FAST, SEAMLESS VISUALS.
Videos and games come to life with an incredibly fast 2ms with overdrive gray to gray (typical) response time and brilliant LED backlight.



MEGA-DYNAMIC CONTRAST
Watch images pop in amazing detail with an estimated mega-dynamic contrast ratio of 8,000,000:1 (typical).



THRILLING FULL HD
Enjoy cinema-like viewing with Full HD (1920x1080 max.) resolution and an 82% color gamut for vivid images.



ENERGY-EFFICIENT DESIGN
Experience high performance and efficiency with a monitor that's EPEAT Silver and ENERGY STAR® qualified.


COMPLEMENT YOUR DÉCOR WITH A BEAUTIFUL, THIN DESIGN.
Designed to be a powerhouse of visual excitement, the ultra-slim Dell S2330MX monitor can provide a 16:9 widescreen experience in almost any space.



SLIM, CONTEMPORARY LOOKS
Bring visual impact and a sense of style to any room in your home with this sleek, ultra-slim monitor.



SPACE-SAVING DESIGN
The Dell S2330MX monitor can save you valuable desktop space with its ultra-slim design and compact base.



EASY CONNECTIONS
Make seamless connections with the VGA, DVI ports, or simply convert your DVI port to HDMI with the included DVI-HDMI dongle.





S2330MX HD LED MONITOR AT A GLANCE...
 * Diagonal Viewable Size: 23"
 * Display Type: LED flat panel, twisted nematic, non-glare
 * Aspect Ratio: widescreen (16:9)
 * Maximum Resolution: Full HD 1920x1080 (60Hz)
 * Contrast Ratio: 1000:1 static (typical), 8 Million:1 dynamic (estimated)
 * Brightness: 250 cd/m2 (typical)
 * Response Time: 2ms typical overdrive (gray to gray)
 * Viewing Angle: 160° vertical / 170° horizontal
 * Color Gamut: 82 % (CIE 1976) / 72% (CIE 1931)
 * Pixel Pitch: 0.265mm
 * Connectivity: VGA, DVI-D (HDCP)



PHOTO GALLERY





FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Thrilling HD visuals in a beautifully thin design. Enjoy full high-definition viewing on a 23" monitor that's incredibly slim, exceptionally sleek and environmentally conscientious.
feature_bullets: Ultra-slim panel: Add design flair to virtually any space with Dell’sTM slimmest LED monitor ever.
Full high-definition viewing: Enjoy an incredible multimedia experience with Full HD (1920x1080 max.) resolution.
Environmentally conscientious design: Rest easy knowing your DellTM S2330MX monitor is designed to be safe for your home and the environment with arsenic-free and mercury-free LED panels.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars70 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
